fields.name: Large Space (Passive):
fields.value: ** You are fat and because of that, if you're still alive, whenever someone targets you with an ability, they will have a count of (the amount of times you got attacked by someone using an ability) votes on them during the next day phase for commiting hate crimes.

fields.name: Fart Attack:
fields.value: ** You can choose three responses in a round to fart in order to reduce their score by 5% after the results have shown up. However you can only use this attack once.
